body_html:
I don't get it either...
So users with older CPU are forced to use an outdated tensorflow API, probably leading to incompatible code in the future, just because AVX is required - unnecessarily! (Because building it without AVX shows that it is not really needed.) I understand that it improves performance. But in my opinion the most basic pip-installed build should target as many systems as possible. Performance aware users should use an advanced/custom build anyway. So what's the point of requiring AVX for everyone?
